name: Revenge Quest
description: Make it past the blockades of robotic mafia minions and find out who's pulling the strings. Don't forget to ask a friend for help!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 2 Processor: (1.2 GHz) Intel Pentium 4, AMD Opteron or AMD Athlon 64 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
